title: Audit reference manual before 1.0
body:
Shortly before 1.0 we should give some attention to the manual and make sure it's not too inaccurate nor incomplete.

---

Let's crowdsource this edit! Please check one of these sections, and leave a comment below if you've verified that it's accurate or have sent a PR fixing part:
- [x] 1 Introduction
- [x] 2 Notation
- [x] 2.1 Unicode productions
- [x] 2.2 String table productions
- [x] 3 Lexical structure
- [x] 3.1 Input format
- [x] 3.2 Special Unicode Productions
- [x] 3.2.1 Identifiers
- [x] 3.2.2 Delimiter-restricted productions
- [x] 3.3 Comments
- [x] 3.4 Whitespace
- [x] 3.5 Tokens
- [x] 3.5.1 Keywords
